ARABIC: ٱلْيَوْمَ تُجْزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ لَا ظُلْمَ ٱلْيَوْمَ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلْحِسَابِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Every self will be repaid today for what it earned. Today there will be no injustice. Allah is swift at reckoning.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Each soul will be recompensed that Day for what it had earned. There will be no depriving on that Day. Surely God is swift at reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (It will then be said): “Today shall everyone be fully recompensed for his deeds. None shall be wronged today. Surely Allah is Swift in Reckoning.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Every soul will be recompensed for its deeds on this Day. There will be no injustice. Certainly God's reckoning is swift.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This day each soul will be repaid for what it has earned; no one will be wronged this day; indeed Allah is Swift At Taking Account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This Day shall every person be recompensed for what he earned. This Day no injustice. Truly, Allah is swift in reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This day every soul shall be rewarded for what it has earned; no injustice (shall be done) this day; surely Allah is quick in reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Today each soul shall be recompensed for that it has earned; no wrong today. Surely God is swift at the reckoning.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This day is each soul requited that which it hath earned; no wrong (is done) this day. Lo! Allah is swift at reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: That Day every soul shall be requited for what it has earned. On that Day none shall be wronged. And God is swift in reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: To-day each soul will be recompensed for that which it hath earned; no wrong-doing to-day; verily Allah is Swift at reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘Today every soul shall be requited for what it has earned. There will be no injustice today. Indeed Allah is swift at reckoning.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That Day will every soul be requited for what it earned; no injustice will there be that Day, for Allah is Swift in taking account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: This Day shall every person be recompensed for what he earned. No injustice (shall be done to anybody). Truly, Allah is Swift in reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On that Day every soul shall be recompensed for its earnings and on that Day none shall be wronged. The reckoning of Allah is swift.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On that Day, every soul will be recompensed for what it had earned. There will be no injustice on that Day. God is quick to settle accounts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: This Day every soul will be recompensed for what it earned. No injustice today! Indeed, Allah is swift in account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:17] Today every soul shall be requited for what it has earned; there will be no injustice today. Indeed God is swift at reckoning’, reckoning with all of creation in the space of half a day of the days of this world — a hadīth states this.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (This day) which is the Day of Judgement (each soul) whether it is righteous or sinful (is requited that which it hath earned) of good or evil; (no wrong (is done) this day) none will have his good deeds decreased or his evil works increased. (Lo! Allah is swift at reckoning) when He takes to task; it is also said that this means: When He punishes, Allah is severe in His punishment. 541
